mapper.select: select m.NO, m.TITLE, ( select i2.NAME from INTERESTS i2 where i2.CATEGORY_CODE = i.CATEGORY_PARENT ) CATEGORY_PARENT, i.name CATEGORY_NAME, ( select count(*) from USER_MEETING um where um.MEETING_NO = m.NO ) PERSON_COUNT, m.PERSON_NUMBER, ( select JSON_ARRAYAGG(T.TAG_NAME) TAGS from MEETING_TAG M join TAG T on T.TAG_NO = M.TAG_NO where MEETING_NO = m.NO group by MEETING_NO ) TAGS, m.DUES, ( select count(*) from MEETING_LIKE ML where ML.MEETING_NO = m.NO ) LIKE_COUNT, MI.IMAGE_NAME, MA.SIGUNGU from MEETING m join INTERESTS I on I.CATEGORY_CODE = m.CATEGORY_CODE join MEETING_ADDRESS MA on m.NO = MA.MEETING_NO join MEETING_IMAGES MI on m.NO = MI.MEETING_NO where USER_NO = #{userNo} and DEL_TAG = 'N' and MI.SEQ = 1
